item.title: By: Akroma
item.dc:creator: Akroma
item.description:
Thank you so much for the course. It wasn't easy to learn the hotkeys at the beginning but your pdf files helped me revise after practice sessions with friends. a week later I beat a friend who was crushing us all in a 2v2s so I could not be any happier hahahaha much appreciate bud im def reading more of your stuff ;)
Akroma
item.content:encoded:
Thank you so much for the course. It wasn’t easy to learn the hotkeys at the beginning but your pdf files helped me revise after practice sessions with friends. a week later I beat a friend who was crushing us all in a 2v2s so I could not be any happier hahahaha much appreciate bud im def reading more of your stuff ðŸ˜‰

Akroma

item.title: By: GregStein
item.dc:creator: GregStein
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://ageofnotes.com/beginners/complete-hotkeys-guide-for-age-of-empires-2-definitive/#comment-540">ben</a>.
Yes, 100% Theviper hotkeys! He uses the classic preset from AoC2. I will add Nili's and Hera's asap. I said asap because they do not share their hki file so I will have to watch their videos and create the hki file myself. Thank you!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to ben.

Yes, 100% Theviper hotkeys! He uses the classic preset from AoC2. I will add Nili’s and Hera’s asap. I said asap because they do not share their hki file so I will have to watch their videos and create the hki file myself. Thank you!

item.title: By: ben
item.dc:creator: ben
item.description: are you sure is viper hot keys? you should add nili hot keys
item.content:encoded: are you sure is viper hot keys? you should add nili hot keys
